Endorsement.Revision_Desc:
In consideration of an additional premium of $4,083.00 plus applicable taxes and fees, it is hereby understood and agreed that the policy has been amended as follows:
Building square footage is amended to show 7000 square feet;
Grocery Sales limit is increased to $1,800,000
Surplus Lines Tax: $198.03 Stamp Fee: $6.12

No change in premium as it's rated the same as MNC.
#2 Please remove the warranty for the automatic sprinkler system and remove the credit for the sprinkler system. Both insured and inspection confirm they do not have it. Additional premium = $1657 + $17 in terrorism = $1674
#3 Please increase the number of pumps to 9 (increase of 1) Class code - 13454 Additional premium = $131 + $1 for terrorism = $132</inst>
